backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend with user profile management, asset storage, and creative package CRUD operations, all gated behind access control authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference overview of the frontend codebase structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property color tokens for both light and dark themes, plus base border and background styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing view state (form/results/history), orchestrating creative package generation, and routing between CreativeForm, CreativeResults, and PackageHistory components.
frontend/src/components/CreativeForm.tsx: Multi-step form component for collecting product details, platform selection, funnel stage, and tone mode, with validation before submitting inputs to the creative generator.
Tabbed results display rendering all generated creative package sections with per-section copy buttons and a Save Package action that persists the package to the backend.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component providing a sticky header with navigation, a conditional hero banner on the form view, and a main content area wrapping child views.
frontend/src/components/PackageHistory.t: React component that displays a list of saved creative packages fetched from the backend, allowing users to select a package to load or navigate to create a new one. Handles loading, error, and empty states with skeleton placeholders and appropriate UI feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all creative packages, fetching a single package by ID, and saving a new creative package to the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including brand colors, surfaces, and reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/creativeGenerator.ts: Contains TypeScript types for creative package data and a pure function `generateCreativePackage` that produces audience personas, hooks, scripts, ad copy, and shot breakdowns based on product inputs, funnel stage, and tone mode.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, shadows, and accordion animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing a UGC video creative director AI agent app, listing existing features, architectural notes, and versioning metadata for build planning.
